name: portal-big-data
description: Portal Big Data - Hub completo para Hadoop e tecnologias Big Data

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run optimize:images && npm run generate:webp && npm run generate:avif
scripts.build:css: postcss assets/css/matrix-theme.css -o assets/css/matrix-theme.min.css --use autoprefixer cssnano && postcss assets/css/image-optimization.css -o assets/css/image-optimization.min.css --use autoprefixer cssnano
scripts.build:js: terser assets/js/main.js -o assets/js/main.min.js --compress --mangle && npm run build:optimization-js
scripts.build:optimization-js: terser assets/js/image-optimization.js assets/js/cdn-config.js assets/js/asset-compression.js assets/js/placeholder-generator.js -o assets/js/optimization.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.test:seo: npm run validate && npm run lighthouse
scripts.compress:all: npm run optimize:images && npm run generate:webp && npm run generate:avif

author: Portal Big Data Team
